title: Assess Unconventional Shale Play
description: A geologist analyzes an unconventional shale play by creating maps of key properties like thickness and total organic carbon (TOC) to identify the most promising areas.

tasks.description: Gather all available well log and core data across the shale play.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive dataset is compiled in a project database.

tasks.description: Generate contour maps of shale thickness, TOC, and thermal maturity based on the well data.
tasks.expected_outcome: A set of maps is created that visualizes the sweet spots of the play.

tasks.description: Overlay the maps to create a composite 'sweet spot' map that highlights the most prospective areas for leasing and drilling.
tasks.expected_outcome: A final map identifying the core area of the play is generated.
